# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O common-tosca-catalog-1.0.0-RC0-linux64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1039/org/openo/common-tosca/catalog/catalog-all/1.0.0-RC0/catalog-all-1.0.0-RC0-linux64.tar.gz
RUN tar -xf common-tosca-catalog-1.0.0-RC0-linux64.tar.gz
RUN rm -f common-tosca-catalog-1.0.0-RC0-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8200
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1039 > VERSION
